snippet: The meeting represents a new attempt by the Obama administration to pursue a political solution to the conflict in Syria.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry meets with Russian Pres Vladimir Putin in Sochi, Russia, to discuss possibilities for political resolution to conflict in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The meeting represents a new attempt by the Obama administration to pursue a political solution to the conflict in Syria.

headline.main: Kerry, Seeking Answers on Conflict in Syria, to Meet With Putin
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: Kerry and Putin to Discuss Syria
